column4: Is there a program that will start an internet radiostation as an alarm. And with a certain volume on the station. Does this exist? (10.04)
I think audacious might have an alarm plugin. but it needs to already be running, another option is to try to make a cron job which start it daily.
openoffice itself is an all in one application isn't it?
I found this one the web:  The Database program is not installed with Ubuntu 10.04 out of the box. It simply does not fit on the CD.
